article: german foreign minister frank-walter steinmeier were meeting thursday in the northern city of hamburg for talks with iran 's former top nuclear negotiator ali larijani and his successor , saeed jalili , a ministry spokeswoman said .
abstract: german foreign minister meets with iran s former top nuclear negotiator and successor
